  <description>
    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>72435741-aabb-4efd-b1d4-9394cd277fb1#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kalapos gomba</string>
            <string language="en">Hatted fungus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hatted Pilz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mycète de Hatted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fungo de Hatted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fungo di Hatted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hatted μύκητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hongo de Hatted</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A fenyőerdők tűlevelekkel borított talaján sok lebontó gomba él</string>
            <string language="en">Many destructive fungus live on pine-forests' ground covered with pine-needle</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">lebontók,  gomba,  bazídiumos gomba,  szimbioózis,  </string>
            <string language="en">decomposers, fungus, basidial fungus, symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viel zerstörender Pilz Phasen auf den 
Kiefer-Wäldern gerieben bedeckt mit Kiefer-Nadel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup de mycète destructif de phase sur les 
pin-forê rectifiées couvertes de pin-aiguille</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muito fungo destrutivo vivo nas pinho-florestas 
moídas cobertas com a pinho-agulha</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molto fungo distruttivo in tensione sulle 
pino-foreste macinate coperte di pino-ago</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλοί καταστρεπτικός μύκητας ζωντανός στο έδαφος των
πεύκο-δασών που καλύπτεται με την πεύκο-βελόνα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mucho hongo destructivo vivo en los pino-bosques 
molidos cubiertos con la pino-aguja</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">decomposers, Pilz, basidial Pilz, Symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">decomposers, mycète, mycète basidial, symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">decomposers, fungo, fungo basidial, symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">decomposers, fungo, fungo basidial, simbiosi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">decomposers, μύκητας, βασιδιακός μύκητας, συμβίωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">decomposers, hongo, hongo basidial, simbiosis</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
